originalText.text: Gerben is hands down the best choice for trademark services. Josh and his team have been instrumental in helping me resolve a trademark office action and successfully register my trademark. Their knowledge of trademark law is extensive, and delivered top-notch service as they guided me through the complexities of the process with ease. They were responsive, proactive, and ensured my needs were met. If you want a dedicated and highly capable team to handle your trademark matter, look no further!

originalText.text: Josh and his team were great to work with on our trademark challenges. They provided education in areas we had questions and ensured any errors that we previously made we corrected. Highly recommend!

originalText.text:
This law firm is a true standout in their field, especially concerning our recent trademark request.Our assigned lawyer showed genuine interest in our business and crafted a robust trademark application that ensured comprehensive protection. Communication was prompt and clear, making us feel valued and well-informed throughout the process.
We highly recommend their services to any business needing top-notch legal assistance.

originalText.text: Date: 8/4/'23  Thank you for your very capable legal assistance in my efforts to obtain a legal trade mark for my product - the Bio Illuminator. I am very pleased to receive this letter, confirming my TM approval.  Sincerely,  Victor Rodriguez
